qrList.label: 地图
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["大厅","餐厅","主题房","客房"] 地图 |
/setvar key=option ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="" {: /flushvar option | /abort :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="大厅" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到大厅，触发新剧情或顺承前文剧情>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="餐厅" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到餐厅，触发新剧情或顺承前文剧情>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="主题房" {: /flushvar option | /run 主题房 :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="客房" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到客房，触发新剧情或顺承前文剧情>" :} ||

qrList.label: 主题房
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["沼泽","亚特兰蒂斯","森林","天使之城","地牢","牧场","昆虫世界","科技实验室","心理咨询室","返回"] 主题房 |
/setvar key=option ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="" {: /flushvar option | /abort :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="返回" {: /flushvar option | /flushvar order | /run 地图 :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="沼泽" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到沼泽主题房>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="亚特兰蒂斯" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到亚特兰蒂斯主题房>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="森林" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到森林主题房>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="天使之城" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到天使之城主题房>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="地牢" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到地牢主题房>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="牧场" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到牧场主题房>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="昆虫世界" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到昆虫世界主题房>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="科技实验室" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到科技实验室主题房>" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="心理咨询室" {: /send "<Request: {{user}}移动到心理咨询室>" :} ||
/flushvar option ||
/trigger||
